AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull1.synopsis: Tribunal Sewer Hall - Skull Poems - Along the south stone wall, at approximately CTY_Main_A, Position: -1313.75, 2.38, 517.25, place a series of four skulls affixed to the wall just above head level, in a row with about 5 feet between each of them. Use our regular pick-up-able skulls so we can make these interactive (though you can't pick them up). When you click on a skull, it plays a Narrator AD.

AD_Board_Street_TombstonesShop.synopsis: Blackboard in front of Candulhallows' Tombstones

AD_FineSelectionOfTongs.synopsis: Candulhallow's Tombstones - Stockroom - Workbench - Make this interactable

AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull3.synopsis: Tribunal Sewer Hall - Skull Poems - Along the south stone wall, at approximately CTY_Main_A, Position: -1313.75, 2.38, 517.25, place a series of four skulls affixed to the wall just above head level, in a row with about 5 feet between each of them. Use our regular pick-up-able skulls so we can make these interactive (though you can't pick them up). When you click on a skull, it plays a Narrator AD.

Use our regular pick-up-able skulls so we can make these interactive (though you can't pick them up). When you click on a skull, it plays a Narrator AD.

AD_AntechamberOfMurder.synopsis: Tribunal Antechamber - Granite Bench - When a player sits on the bench it plays a Narrator AD

AD_FlamingFistsThisWay.synopsis: Tribunal Sewer Hall, Fist Trap, Stand an interactable easel at the head of the way down into the misty sublevel (at approximately CTY_Main_A, Position: -1329.25, 2.41, 522.65)

AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull1_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull1_0.text: *There's something engraved on this skull. 'Living, a torment of sorrow and strife'*

AD_Board_Street_TombstonesShop_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Board_Street_TombstonesShop_0.text: *Candulhallow's Tombstones. Remembering the deceased with sympathy and skill.*

AD_ShopTombstone10_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone10_0.text: *No name has been engraved, but the message beneath is clear: 'Should have left those orphans on the street where they belonged.'*

AD_FineSelectionOfTongs_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FineSelectionOfTongs_0.text: *A fine selection of tongs - the one indispensable tool of the artisan's workshop, it seems. Tongs. So many tongs.*

AD_ShopTombstone05_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone05_0.text: *The engraving on this tombstone was abandoned part way through. It says, simply, 'Neesha'.*

AD_ShopTombstone00_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone00_0.text: *SAMPLE TOMBSTONE. Premium edition. With optional engraving of iconography.*

AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull3_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull3_0.text: *'We faithful cure mortals of burdensome life'*

AD_ShopTombstone04_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone04_0.text: *This tombstone still bears the dust from its recent engraving - 'Varri Vanthampur. Unwanted in life, welcomed in death.'*

AD_ShopTombstone08_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone08_0.text: *May Winfield. Mother of twelve, wife of one. Beloved by all.*

AD_ShopTombstone02_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone02_0.text: *SAMPLE TOMBSTONE. Modest edition. Maximum engraving length: three words.*

AD_ShopTombstone11_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone11_0.text: *This one has been engraved over so many times that no names are legible.*

AD_ShopTombstone06_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone06_0.text: *Beloved Reynald. Father, husband, duck-breeder. Gone too soon.*

AD_ShopTombstone07_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone07_0.text: *Franc Peartree. Our Lady's Traitor. His life now given, gladly taken.*

AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull2_0.text: *It's a poem! It continues, 'Is a burden to great and to small'*

AD_ShopTombstone03_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone03_0.text: *YOUR NAME HERE. Plan ahead, so distant relatives don't do it for you.*

AD_ShopTombstone01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone01_0.text: *This tombstone appears to be freshly carved. 'Fridrik Hhune. His last connection with this realm, severed.'*

AD_ShopTombstone09_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShopTombstone09_0.text: *Alexander Rainforest. Meticulous in life, mellifluous in death.*

AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull4_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TribunalSewerHallSkull4_0.text: *'And present it to death-father Bhaal' - verse by Invoker Grimlark*

AD_AntechamberOfMurder_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_AntechamberOfMurder_0.text: *A bench in the antechamber of Murder. How many have sat here, waiting their turn, and what thoughts passed through their heads?*
